text: Kylie Jenner posted an underwear selfie on Wednesday, showing off her unusually thin waist and toned six - pack. The makeup mogul ’ s snapshot was immediately called into question, though, by fans who accused her of photoshopping the image. In the background of the photo, a curtain appears to be warped, right where Jenner ’ s super slim waistline begins. Right away, commenters started speculating. “ I feel like its photoshopped, ” one fan wrote. “ U do realize no matter how famous u are, u are perfect as long as u are yourself. ” Responding to the rumors, Jenner posted videos on Snapchat showing her wearing the same black Puma underwear as in the photo. “ For the photoshop police, ” she caption
